program.name: libIDL
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" CPP=/usr/ccs/lib/cpp export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc=-qnostdinc CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -Ae -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CPP="/usr/ccs/lbin/cpp -P" export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc="" export ac_cv_cpp_pipe_stdin=no CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" CPP="cc -E" export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc=-nostdinc CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CPP=/usr/bin/cpp export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc=-nostdinc CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CPP=/usr/lib/cpp export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc=-I CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CPP=/usr/ccs/lib/cpp export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc="-YI,/" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CPP=/usr/ccs/lib/cpp export ac_cv_cpp_nostdinc="-YI,/" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" ${CPP+CPP="${CPP}"} \ CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\${exec_prefix}/lib\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1 !g" libIDL-config-2
for _pc in libIDL-2.0.pc; do ${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" ${_pc} done
